<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We unique sections by their segment/section pair.  The returned section</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do the lookup, if we have a hit, return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R = MachOUniquingMap.try&#95;emplace((Segment + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;,&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) + Section).str());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name = R.first-&gt;first();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Ret = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">new</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachOAllocator.Allocate())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  R.first-&gt;second = Ret;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// repeat the compilation dir.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The MCContext ctor initializes MainFileName to the name associated with</span></CodeLine>
